animeTitle: Stand My Heroes: Piece of Truth (Dub)
otherNames: スタンドマイヒーローズ PIECE OF TRUTH
synopsis: The heroine is a new officer works under the Narcotics Control Department of the Ministry of Health, a.k.a Matori. Narcotic medicines don't work on her, and the story begins with her just entering the department and starting work with other officers.
